summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Ambulatorio Infermieristico modifications. Successfully verified most requested features including login, user menu repositioning, patient counters with filtering, statistics with implant tab, and patient status management. Backend API working well (93.8% success rate). Session management remains an issue affecting extended testing.

minor_bugs.issue: Returns status 200 instead of 201 for successful creation

ui_bugs.issue: Session expires quickly during testing, requiring frequent re-login
ui_bugs.impact: Affects user experience and testing continuity

integration_issues.issue: Delete option in patient dropdown menu not consistently accessible

passed_tests: Login with Domenico/infermiere credentials working correctly
User menu and ambulatory selector moved to top right header as requested
Ambulatory selection showing both PTA Centro and Villa delle Ginestre
Patients page displaying PICC/MED counters with correct counts (2 PICC, 3 MED, 5 total)
PICC/MED counters are clickable for filtering functionality
Patient status tabs (In Cura, Sospesi, Dimessi) working correctly
Statistics page loading with PDF and Excel export buttons
Statistics page includes new 'Statistiche Impianti' tab as requested
Implant statistics tab displays content correctly (Totale Impianti, etc.)
Patient details page accessible with proper navigation
PICC patient management sections visible (Anagrafica, Impianto PICC, Gestione PICC, Foto)
Patient status change buttons (Sospendi, Dimetti) present in patient details
Navigation between main sections working correctly
Italian localization working correctly throughout the application
Responsive design working on desktop viewport (1920x1080)
action_item_for_main_agent: MEDIUM PRIORITY: Improve session management to prevent frequent timeouts during normal usage. Verify patient dropdown delete functionality is consistently accessible. Consider implementing session refresh or extending timeout duration for better user experience.

success_percentage.backend: 93.8% (15/16 tests passed - minor status code issue)
success_percentage.frontend: 85% (Most core features working, session management and dropdown access issues)
